message: There's only one or two minor tweaks left to make before 1.0 is all cooked and ready to go
but I'd love it if any of y'all who haven't already could nab the latest master and play around with it to see if you can find any nasty bugs in the new features
though last minute "holy shit this is a retarded idea" feedback is welcome for the stuff listed under "Backwards incompatible changes"
Also, I'm strongly considering buying a private jet and contracting a midair refueling company -- I've gotten a ton done during all this wifi-less cross-continental air travel.

@ericholscher BTW we need to sit down and have The Talk about RTD sometime, need a memory refresh -- I know you've added pretty much everything I need by now but haven't been able to focus and see it all myself.
Probably early next week if you have a few minutes on IRC sometime.
@bitprophet for sure. Let me know what works well for you. I just got celery switched over, so you're next on my list :)
